name: Aging Room - Core Connecticut - Andante
additionalNotes: The Aging Room Core Connecticut has a Dominican filler and binder that supports an attractive, light-brown Ecuadorian Connecticut Shade wrapper. Handmade at the Tabacalera Palma factory in the Dominican Republic, Core Connecticut provides a mild, yet wonderfully flavorful smoking experience. The Aging Room Core Connecticut was created after Rafael Nodal, founder and owner of Aging Room Cigars, revamped his revered Boutique Brands collection.
